snippet: The “Marathon Variety Show” at the Metropolitan Room will feature dozens of artists performing for 60 hours of nonstop cabaret.
abstract: The “Marathon Variety Show” at the Metropolitan Room will feature dozens of artists performing for 60 hours of nonstop cabaret.

headline.main: Cabaret Cram Session Aims at a World Record
